title: erosbook
author: erosbook
created_time: August 22, 2022, 05:20:36 PMLast edit: October 31, 2022, 12:25:02 PM by erosbook
content: ErosBook ICO - EROS - Public SaleWe are launching an initial coin offering (ICO) to help us develope the first worldwide escort platform that combines verification, booking, scheduling, payment and reviews in a single interface. ErosBook Coin (EROS) is the native token for the ErosBook ecosystem and plays an integral role in all our apps and services.EROS specificationsName: ErosBook coinSymbol: EROS Blockchain: ETH - ERC20Type: UtilityTotal supply: 500 millionPrice: 0.025$Token use casesErosBook Coin (EROS) can be used by clients, escorts, agencies and investors. For clients and escorts, it provides incentives to publish and review accurate information about escort profiles and user experiences. EROS can also be used to pay for the various services of the ErosBook apps (bookings, promote profiles, vip memberships). For investors, it allows to own shares in the company and receive a percentage of the profits of a multibillion-dollar industry.Token AllocationOut of the total supply of 500 million EROS, 70% of the tokens are sold during the seed sale and public sales of the ICO. Some tokens are reserved for community events, such as affiliate commissions, airdrops and bounties and in-app rewardsDemo AppYou can check a prototype of our application at www.erosbook.io, where you can find escorts wordwide, publish new profiles, post experiences and rate escorts.Affiliate ProgramEarn free EROS by joining ErosBook ICO Affiliate Program! You will receive affiliate commissions for every user that buys tokens through your affiliate link. You can get free tokens from 3 levels of referrals.AirdropErosBook is giving away a total of 3 million EROS (worth $75,000) to participants. Sign up and follow ErosBook on social media to earn a 400 EROS reward (worth $10). The airdrop reward will decrease in each phase of the crowdsale. Join ErosBook ICO now and don't miss this opportunity! Check details here.Bounty ProgramThe ErosBook bounty program offers a total of 12 million EROS (worth $300,000) for users that contribute to promote the ICO. Amazing reward can be claimed for completing specified tasks, such as social media posts, youtube videos or reviews and articles. Check details here.CommunityTwitterFacebookRedditYoutubeInstagramTelegramPUBLIC SALE is live until January 16 - Buy EROS - ErosBook coin hereErosBook ICO airdrop & bounties threadErosBook APP main thread

comments.body: üîâ The seed sale of ErosBook ICO starts in less than 24 hours. Be ready! Tomorrow monday 29 at 12:00 UTC you can buy EROS for 0.005$, that's a 80% discount! Remember that you can get +5% EROS with the Affiliaite program.üéÅ At the same time, the Bounty program will open with amazing rewards for posting about ErosBook in twitter, facebook, reddit, and for publishing articles and videos on youtube. Create an account with the profile 'ICO investor / participant' to check all the details about the crowdsale and the bounty program.

comments.author: erosbook
comments.body: üîà Here it is! The #ErosBook ICO Seed Sale just started. Be the first to buy #EROS with a 80% discount!

comments.author: spiker777
comments.body: Quote from: erosbook on August 29, 2022, 12:24:35 PMüîà Here it is! The #ErosBook ICO Seed Sale just started. Be the first to buy #EROS with a 80% discount!it is very rare to see a project doing ICO directly in their website. ICO era gone long. it is now IDO, IEO Era. if you want to do a successful tokensale. you would have to run your tokensale in an IDO launchpad or do an IEO via a reputable exchange.plus I see your website is very common and features also limited. also you should Put NSFW to against your website link.

comments.body: Important‚ùóÔ∏è The seed sale of ErosBook ICO ends in one week! You can buy EROS for $0.005, that's a 80% discount! On the next stage of the crowdsale the discount will be halved: www.erosbook.io

comments.author: erosbook
comments.body: ErosBook ICO Seed Sale comes to the end! Today was the last day of the Seed sale stage of our ICO. Thank you to all participants for your support. The next stage of the ICO is going to start on October 24.Meanwhile, we will be preparing the white paper and improving our website. Rembember that you can still get free EROS with the Airdrop and the Bounty Program.

comments.author: Blowon
comments.body: Quote from: erosbook on September 05, 2022, 02:16:41 PMWe have a bitcointalk weekly campaign, these are the rewards:Jr. Member / Member: 100 EROS/weekFull Member:¬†¬†¬†200 EROS/weekSenior Member: 400 EROS/weekHero Member: 800 EROS/weekLegendary: 1600 EROS/weekTo participate in it, sign up at erosbook.io with 'ico participant' profile and read the steps and rules.it would be better if you create a special bounty thread for this campaign so that everyone can see it, I see not only your signature campaign you are also running a social media campaign so it will be good for many people to see

comments.author: erosbook
comments.body: We approved all the pending claims of the #ErosBook ICO Bounty program. Sign in to your account to see how many #EROS you received. Although the public sale is not open yet, you can get new free EROS rewards every week.http://erosbook.io/ico-home

comments.author: royalfestus
comments.body: Quote from: erosbook on September 30, 2022, 06:46:56 PMWe approved all the pending claims of the #ErosBook ICO Bounty program. Sign in to your account to see how many #EROS you received. Although the public sale is not open yet, you can get new free EROS rewards every week.http://erosbook.io/ico-homeThe information about the signature campaign is not sufficient; No signature, No avatar etc. Since we do not have any credible bounty manager for the campaign how can hunters be assured of been rewarded after the campaign. Eros sound like a token on the forum in the past, has the name been verified very well? The team has a very low ratings on foundico and Icoholder, why have they not clearify this if they want to provide themselves to public through those platforms. The social presence is also low and am tempted to ask when did the project come out and why the ico is so fast in such a bearish market?

It has been almost a week since the last postHello, sorry for the delay in responding. Right now, we are preparing the Public Sale which starts in a week. We will try to improve our presence on ICO listings and social media. Also, we will improve the Bitcointalk campaign to make it more attractive. Thanks for your comment and advice.

comments.body: Can we verify the amount raised?

comments.author: erosbook
comments.body: The stage 2 of the ErosBook ICO Public Sale starts today, November 21. One hundred million EROS are available (20% of the total supply) at a price of $0.02. This stage is active until December 19.We also approved all the pending claims of the Bounty program. You can view your rewards at the Investor dashboard. Remember that airdrop claims will be approved when the ICO ends.

comments.author: royalfestus
comments.body: Quote from: erosbook on November 21, 2022, 04:29:23 PMThe stage 2 of the ErosBook ICO Public Sale starts today, November 21. One hundred million EROS are available (20% of the total supply) at a price of $0.02. This stage is active until December 19.We also approved all the pending claims of the Bounty program. You can view your rewards at the Investor dashboard. Remember that airdrop claims will be approved when the ICO ends.Although I apologize for asking this question, I find it difficult to believe that some projects are still getting funding at this stage of the market without strong partners and influencers. The previous fund raised is nowhere to be found, so I asked about it. Public sale has progressed to stage 2, which means the first target was reached, how much was raised at stage 1 and what will be raised at stage 2?

comments.author: erosbook
comments.body: We are excited to announce that the #ErosBook ICO Public Sale stage 3 is now live! Get your hands on 100M EROS (20% of the total supply) for only $0.025 each before January 16th. Don't miss out on this amazing opportunity!

comments.author: erosbook
comments.body: Hurry! The #ErosBook ICO Public Sale ends in just 1 week. Don't miss your chance to get your hands on EROS tokens and join the future of escort booking. Act fast before it's too late! #ICO #cryptocurrency
